properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDR, SIGNUP_DT, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=? AND MEMBER_PW =? AND MEMBER_STATUS='Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ?)
